CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 21, 1962, pg. A14 reads:"Surprise Party - Mrs. Henrietta A. Gaines of Highland View Heights, Penn Hills, recently was feted at a surprise birthday party, given by her children, at the home of her daughter and son-in-law, Mr. and Mrs. Theodore Ketchum. Left to right, seated: Mrs. Thomas Love, John Gaines, Mrs. Gaines, the honoree, and Miss Marjorie Gaines.  Standing: Thomas Love, Mrs. Theodore Ketchum, Mrs. Charles Gaines Jr. and Theodore Ketchum - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left, seated: Mrs. Thomas Love, John Gaines, Henrietta A. Gaines, the honoree; and Marjorie Gaines; standing: Thomas Love, Mrs. Theodore Ketchum, Mrs. Charles Gaines Jr., and Theodore Ketchum gathered around sofa for surprise birthday party in home of of Mr. and Mrs. Theodore Ketchum, another version
